title: Deathtouch
definition: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

title: Defender
definition: This creature can't attack.

title: Double strike
definition: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

title: First Strike
definition: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

title: Flying
definition: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying and/or reach.

title: Haste
definition: This creature can attack and tap as soon as it comes under your control.

title: Hexproof
definition: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

title: Indestructable
definition: Effects that say "destroy" donâ€™t destroy this.

title: Intimidate
definition: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.

title: Plainswalk
definition: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a plains.

title: Islandwalk
definition: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a island.

title: Mountainwalk
definition: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a mountain.

title: Swapwalk
definition: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a swamp.

title: Forestwalk
definition: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a forest.

title: Lifelink
definition: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

title: Protection from red
definition: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything red.

title: Protection from blue
definition: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.

title: Protection from green
definition: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything green.

title: Protection from white
definition: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.

title: Protection from black
definition: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.

title: Protection
definition: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything [quality].

title: Reach
definition: This creature can block creature with flying.

title: Shroud
definition: This permanent or player can't be the target of spell or abilities.

title: Trample
definition: This creature can deal excess combat damage to player or planeswalker it's attacking.

title: Vigiliance
definition: TAttacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.

title: Banding
definition: Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.

title: Rampage N
definition: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +N/+N until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

title: Flanking
definition: Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

title: Phasing
definition: This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.

title: Shadow
definition: This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.

title: Horsemanship
definition: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.

title: Fear
definition: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.

title: Provoke
definition: Whenever this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.

title: Bushido N
definition: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +N/+N until end of turn.

title: Frenzy N
definition: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +N/+0 until end of turn.

title: Absorb N
definition: If a source would deal damage to this creature, prevent N of that damage.

title: Poisonous N
definition: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets N poison counters.

title: Changeling
definition: This card is every creature type.

title: Exalted
definition: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

title: Annihilator N
definition: Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices N permanents.

title: Infect
definition: This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.

title: Wither
definition: This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.

title: Battle cry
definition: Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

title: Undying
definition: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

title: Evolve
definition: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

title: Dethrone
definition: Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

title: Menace
definition: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

title: Renown N
definition: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put N +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.

title: Devoid
definition: This card has no color.

title: Ingest
definition: (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library

title: Myriad
definition: Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker he or she controls. If one or more tokens are created this way, exile the tokens at end of combat.

title: Skulk
definition: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.

title: Melee
definition: Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.

title: Afflict N
definition: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses N life.

title: Mentor
definition: Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.

title: Afterlife N
definition: When this creatures dies, N 1/1 white and black Spirit tokens with flying.

title: Adapt N
definition: [cost]. If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put N +1/+1 counters on it.
